text pasusa 1 dewalt: DeWALT is a brand with a rich tradition spanning over 90 years. It was founded by Raymond DeWalt in 1924, and the company quickly gained a reputation as an innovator in the tool industry. His first patent, the radial arm saw, marked a significant breakthrough in tool development and laid the foundation for further progress. Since then, DeWALT has continuously improved its product range, introducing solutions that make work easier and increase efficiency.
text pasusa 2 dewalt: Each innovation by DeWALT is driven by the desire to enhance performance, ease of use, or productivity. From technology used in space exploration to the integration of Bluetooth technology into its products, DeWALT remains at the forefront of jobsite innovation.
text pasusa 3 dewalt: DeWALT covers a wide range of products. In addition to power and hand tools, they also produce outdoor equipment, tool accessories, protective gear, storage solutions, and anchors. Their offering also includes laser measurers and levels for precise marking, as well as battery platforms compatible with a variety of devices. Their line of toolboxes provides organization and transport solutions for demanding jobsite conditions.
text do kraja dewalt: Join the global community of DeWALT tool users and experience the innovation and power our products deliver. As the importer and distributor for Serbia, we take pride in providing you with access to a wide range of tools that will help you achieve outstanding results in every project.
text pasusa 1 bosch: Bosch is a German company that began its operations in 1886 in Stuttgart. Robert Bosch founded a small workshop for precision mechanical and electrical engineering instruments. They started by producing automotive spark plugs and parts, and later expanded into tools and household appliances. Throughout the 20th century, they became well known in the automotive industry, industrial automation, and the production of batteries and electric motors. Today, they are one of the global leaders in the development of new technologies and the manufacturing of automotive equipment.
text pasusa 2 bosch: Bosch engineers continuously work on advancing technologies to make your tools even more efficient and reliable. Bosch Wireless Charging is one example of this innovation—the world's first wireless charging system for tools, allowing you to charge batteries while you work, without interruptions. Their Bosch Power Tools line uses advanced battery technologies, such as the ProCore18V battery, which provides more power and a longer tool lifespan. In the automotive industry, Bosch stands out with innovations in driver assistance systems and electric vehicles, using the latest technologies to enhance vehicle safety and efficiency.
text pasusa 3 bosch: Their product range includes electric, cordless, and hand tools, as well as accessories and attachments. The company also manufactures kitchen appliances such as washing machines, refrigerators, and coffee makers. They are also prominent in the automotive industry, with driver assistance systems and components for electric vehicles. Through their green program, the company offers gardening and landscaping tools, including lawn mowers and trimmers.
text do kraja bosch: If you're looking for high-quality tools with a 3-year warranty, choose Bosch tools!
text pasusa 1 stanley: Stanley is a company founded in 1843 in the United States by Frederick Stanley. Initially, they produced hinges, bolts, locks, and iron door parts. Later, the focus shifted to hand tool manufacturing, and their subsidiary, Stanley Rule and Level Company, established in 1857, became key to the development of power tools. Throughout the 20th century, Stanley became synonymous with quality tools such as measuring tapes, hand saws, and screwdrivers. In 2010, they merged with Black & Decker, forming the powerhouse Stanley Black & Decker. Today, Stanley owns other well-known brands like DeWALT, Craftsman, and Irwin, and has a global presence as one of the leading manufacturers of tools and equipment.
text pasusa 2 stanley: Stanley stands out for its ability to blend traditional craftsmanship with modern technology. Stanley tools are the result of extensive research and testing to ensure durability and efficiency. The Stanley FatMax line is one of the best examples of these efforts, offering tools reinforced for extra durability and performance. Their FlexVolt technology allows the same battery to be used across different tools, providing greater flexibility and power.
text pasusa 3 stanley: The company covers a wide range of products. In addition to power and hand tools, they produce outdoor equipment, tool accessories, protective gear, and storage solutions. Their offering also includes a broad selection of extension cords and plug-in devices, as well as precision levels and measuring instruments. Stanley is recognized for the quality of its tools and innovations, used in many industries—from construction to automotive.
text do kraja stanley: Discover why millions of users around the world trust Stanley tools for their projects. Our commitment to quality, reliability, and performance makes us a dependable partner for all your needs. With Stanley tools in your hands, every job becomes easier and more efficient.
text pasusa 1 rems: REMS is a company with a rich heritage that has continuously introduced innovations and set new standards in the specialized tool industry since its founding in 1909. REMS tools are designed with one goal in mind: to be the best choice for specialized tasks in pipe installations and other technical systems. Their wide range of products covers everything needed for professional work, from cutting and bending pipes to tools for pressing and freezing pipes.
text pasusa 2 rems: The company focuses on technologically advanced tools for cutting, bending, pressing, and freezing pipes. One of the key innovations is the REMS MultiPress system, which allows for fast and secure pipe pressing with minimal effort. Additionally, REMS tools use battery technologies to increase mobility and efficiency on the job site. They continually improve pipe bending tools, making them lighter and more practical for working in tight spaces.
text pasusa 3 rems: REMS offers a wide range of products. Their offerings include pipe cutting machines, electric and manual devices, as well as tools for freezing pipes and welding plastic pipes. REMS also specializes in soldering, pressure testing, and pipe cleaning. The company stands out with its diamond drilling machines and diamond blades for cutting concrete.
text do kraja rems: Discover why professionals around the world trust REMS tools for their projects. Our commitment to quality, efficiency, and innovation makes us the top choice for all your pipe and installation needs. With REMS tools, every task becomes easier and more productive.
text pasusa 1 wiha: Wiha is a German company founded in 1939, specializing in the production of high-quality hand tools. Since its inception, Wiha has focused on innovations in tool design, particularly in the areas of electric tools and precision instruments. The company has become a recognized brand for its ergonomic tools and exceptional craftsmanship. Wiha produces a wide range of tools, including screwdrivers, wrenches, pliers, and assembly tools, which are highly valued by professionals worldwide. Today, Wiha has a global presence, with production in Germany and distribution in over 80 countries.
text pasusa 2 wiha: Wiha stands out for its continuous innovations and application of advanced technologies in tool design. Their Wiha SoftFinish technology offers handles made from a special material blend that improves grip and reduces effort during rotation. Wiha also applies precision technology in manufacturing, allowing for extremely accurate and durable tools. The company is also a leader in developing tools with insulated handles, safe for use under voltages up to 1000 V, ensuring safe work with electrical installations. Wiha is a company that continuously improves its manufacturing processes.
text pasusa 3 wiha: The company offers a wide range of hand, electric, cordless, measuring, gardening, and many other tools, as well as tool accessories and attachments. Their products are designed for professionals, with a focus on ergonomics, precision, and safety. Wiha is also specialized in insulated tools that enable safe work under voltages up to 1000 V.
text do kraja wiha: Join millions of users around the world who trust the quality and reliability of the Wiha brand. With Wiha tools, you can rely on top performance and achieve outstanding results in every project.
text pasusa 1 knipex: Knipex is a German company founded in 1882 as a small family workshop in Germany. They specialize in the production of hand tools. Today, Knipex is a global leader in the industry, present in over 100 countries, and is known for its continuous investment in technology and the development of new products.
text pasusa 2 knipex: Knipex is renowned for its constant innovations and the application of advanced technologies in the production of its tools. The company focuses on ergonomic design, developing tools that reduce effort and increase efficiency during use, such as pliers with special handles that provide a better grip. Additionally, the company is a leader in the development of tools with automatic locking mechanisms, making it easier for users to work with tougher materials.
text pasusa 3 knipex: The company manufactures power tools, accessories, protective equipment, and other products, but they are specialized in hand tools. Their product range includes pliers, screwdrivers, wrenches, electrical installation accessories, and specialized assembly tools. Knipex also offers tools for precise cutting and crimping, as well as ergonomic tools that reduce effort and increase work efficiency.
text do kraja knipex: Join millions of users around the world who trust the quality and reliability of the Knipex brand. With Knipex tools, you can rely on exceptional performance and achieve outstanding results in every project.
text pasusa 1 gtv: GTV is a Polish company founded in the mid-1990s, specializing in the production and distribution of furniture fittings. Over nearly three decades of operation, GTV has grown into a leader in the industry, with a presence in 70 markets worldwide. Their philosophy is based on continuous improvement and adapting to changing trends and market needs.
text pasusa 2 gtv: GTV expands its product range through constant research and development, offering customers a modern selection. The company implements strict quality control at all stages of production, confirmed by certifications such as SGS and ECJiP. Additionally, the company is committed to environmental sustainability, offering products that meet ecological standards. They are synonymous with innovation, functionality, and aesthetic design.
text pasusa 3 gtv: GTV's product range includes a wide variety of furniture solutions, such as furniture fittings, sliding door systems, accessories for upholstered furniture, and lighting. Their offerings also include hand and power tools, as well as protective equipment. This diversity allows GTV to meet the needs of different customers, providing complete solutions for space furnishing. GTV solutions ensure the seamless operation of every piece of furniture.
text do kraja gtv: Join millions of designers and carpenters who trust the quality and innovation of the GTV brand, bringing a new dimension of functionality and aesthetics to your projects, allowing you to create outstanding pieces of furniture that will satisfy even the most demanding tastes.

text pasusa 1 max: MAX is a company founded in 1942 in Japan, initially focused on manufacturing aircraft parts. Over the years, the company expanded its portfolio to include office equipment and industrial tools. They were pioneers in the development of pneumatic nails in 1962. In 2006, MAX established MAX Europe B.V. in the Netherlands, further expanding into the European market. Today, MAX is a globally recognized manufacturer of high-quality tools and office products, known for its innovations and reliability.
text pasusa 2 max: MAX is a leader in the implementation of advanced technologies in its products. The company was the first in the world to develop a battery-powered tool for tying rebar in 1993, significantly increasing productivity on construction sites. Their PowerLite high-pressure system, introduced in 1994, enables stronger and lighter tools for various applications. MAX also invests in the development of ergonomic solutions, reducing physical strain for users and increasing safety. Each MAX tool is the result of careful craftsmanship and rigorous testing, ensuring top performance and longevity. Their commitment to research and development has resulted in numerous patents and accolades.
text pasusa 3 max: MAX offers a wide range of products for the construction industry and office sector. They manufacture cordless, garden, pneumatic tools, and compressors, as well as tool accessories. In the office equipment sector, MAX produces staplers, label printers, and document processing devices. This diversity allows MAX to meet the needs of various users, providing them with high-quality and innovative solutions.
text do kraja max: Join construction professionals around the world who trust the quality and reliability of the MAX brand.
text pasusa 1 hogert: Högert is a relatively young brand, founded in 2015. Despite this, it is a brand with great ambition to become a key player in the tool industry. Established with the aim of providing high-quality hand tools to professionals across various industries, their philosophy is based on a passion for quality, simplicity, and utility, making them recognizable among demanding users who rely on hand tools daily.
text pasusa 2 hogert: Engineers at Högert Technik are dedicated to developing tools that combine durability and functionality, innovation, and accessibility. Their approach involves precise design of every tool detail. One of their many innovative products is the TOOLBOX HIGH, modular toolboxes that can be connected with other components of the modular system. Products undergo rigorous quality control and possess various certifications. Högert tools are designed to withstand intensive use, reducing the need for frequent replacements and repairs.
text pasusa 3 hogert: Högert offers a wide range of tools, including hand and power tools, protective equipment, as well as mechanical tools like socket wrench sets and screwdrivers, as well as tools for workshops and automotive services. Their offering also includes tool storage solutions, such as mobile carts and cabinets, enabling efficient organization and transport of tools at the workplace.
text do kraja hogert: Join thousands of users around the world who trust the quality and affordability of the Högert brand. With Högert tools, your projects will be completed with ease and reliability, allowing you to achieve exceptional results in every situation.
text pasusa 1 wera: Wera Werkzeuge GmbH is a German manufacturer of hand tools, founded in 1936 in Wuppertal, Germany. During World War II, the company suffered significant damage but was rebuilt after the war under the leadership of Heinz Amtenbrink, the son-in-law of the founder, Hermann Werner. Since 1951, the company has operated under the name Wera. The company’s philosophy is that every tool must be innovative, reliable, and designed with passion. Wera believes that tools should not only perform the job but also provide satisfaction during use, setting new standards in the industry.
text pasusa 2 wera: Wera is known for its innovative solutions in hand tools. In 1968, they developed the Kraftform handle design for screwdrivers, which is shaped to fit the contours of the human hand, providing optimal ergonomics and reducing user fatigue. Additionally, the company introduced the Hex-Plus profile for hex keys, increasing the contact surface with the screw and reducing the risk of damage. Wera is also famous for products such as the Joker wrenches with a nut-holding function, Zyklop multifunctional ratchets, and the Impaktor bit system for impact drivers.
text pasusa 3 wera: Wera offers a wide range of tools. Their assortment includes screwdrivers with various profiles, including VDE insulated screwdrivers for live wire work, bit sets, ratchets, socket wrenches, hex keys, torque wrenches, as well as specialized tools like the Koloss ratchet that can also serve as a hammer. They also produce protective equipment. All products are designed with a focus on ergonomics, functionality, and durability.
text do kraja wera: Join millions of users worldwide who trust the quality and innovation of the Wera brand. With Wera hand tools, your work becomes more efficient and precise, allowing you to achieve outstanding results in every endeavor.
text pasusa 1 rubi: RUBI was founded in 1951 when brothers Boada and Sucarrats patented their innovative tile and ceramic cutting tool. This invention soon became a milestone in the industry. The first manual tile cutter, called RUBI, was presented at the National Invention Exhibition in Barcelona in 1953, where it won a gold medal. Since then, RUBI has become synonymous with high-quality tools in the construction industry, present in more than 120 countries worldwide.
text pasusa 2 rubi: RUBI continuously invests in research and development of new solutions, keeping up with market and technological trends. The company is known for introducing advanced technologies into its products, such as the SLAB SYSTEM for handling and installing large-format tiles, TZ tile cutters, and electric cutters with the innovative ZERO DUST system, which reduces dust during cutting. Each new generation of RUBI products brings improvements that reflect the latest trends and market demands.
text pasusa 3 rubi: RUBI offers a wide range of products in the tile installation sector. Their assortment includes manual and electric tile cutters, diamond discs, drilling tools, mortar mixers, tile leveling systems, as well as cleaning and finishing equipment. All products are designed with a focus on quality, precision, and durability, providing users with reliable solutions for every stage of the tile installation process.
text do kraja rubi: Join professionals worldwide who trust the quality and reliability of the Rubi brand. With Rubi machines and tools for ceramics, your projects will gain a new level of precision and aesthetics, allowing you to achieve outstanding results in every tiling endeavor.
text pasusa 1 senco: SENCO was founded in 1948 in Cincinnati, Ohio, by Albert Julfs, who started with the production of vibration elimination devices for automobiles. In the 1940s, SENCO created the first pneumatic staplers for industrial packaging and upholstery, setting new standards in speed and production efficiency. In 1951, the company officially changed its name to SENCO, short for Springtramp Eliminator Company.
text pasusa 2 senco: SENCO is known for its innovations in fastening tools. In the 1990s, the company launched the DuraSpin line of automatic screwdrivers, revolutionizing the collated screw market. In 2010, SENCO introduced Fusion technology, introducing wireless pneumatic tools that combine the speed and power of pneumatic tools with the convenience of wireless devices, eliminating the need for fuel cells. These innovations are the result of continuous listening to customer needs and a commitment to improving work efficiency and safety.
text pasusa 3 senco: SENCO offers a wide range of fastening tools, including pneumatic and electric nailers, staplers, automatic screw driving systems, and compressors. Their product range also includes various types of nails, staples, screws, and specialized fasteners. All products are designed with a focus on quality, durability, and ease of use. Each product is carefully engineered.
text do kraja senco: Join professionals around the world who trust the quality and reliability of the SENCO brand. With SENCO nailers, your projects will be completed faster and with exceptional results, allowing you to achieve top-notch outcomes in every construction and carpentry endeavor.
text pasusa 1 black+decker: BLACK+DECKER is an American company founded in 1910 in Baltimore, Maryland, by Duncan Black and Alonzo Decker. The company began as a small workshop for manufacturing machines. Their first significant contribution to the tool industry was in 1917 when they patented the first portable electric drill with a pistol grip and trigger, laying the foundation for modern power tools. Over the decades, the company expanded its product range and global presence. In 2010, BLACK+DECKER merged with Stanley Works, forming Stanley Black & Decker, but the BLACK+DECKER brand retained its identity and continued to operate under its well-known name.
text pasusa 2 black+decker: Their first portable electric drill in 1917 revolutionized the way professionals and hobbyists performed tasks. More recently, the company introduced the MATRIX™ system, which allows users to use one base with different attachments for various tasks. Additionally, BLACK+DECKER is committed to sustainability, as seen in the launch of the reviva™ line of tools, whose casings are made from 50% recycled materials.
text pasusa 3 black+decker: BLACK+DECKER offers a wide range of products designed for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Their assortment includes power tools such as drills, saws, grinders, and multifunctional devices. The company also produces garden tools, including lawnmowers, string trimmers, and leaf blowers, making yard maintenance easier. In the home appliance segment, BLACK+DECKER offers vacuum cleaners, steam cleaners, and kitchen appliances like blenders and toasters. These products are designed with a focus on ergonomics, efficiency, and affordability, making them suitable for a wide range of users. Every product is carefully designed.
text do kraja black+decker: Join millions of users around the world who trust the quality and innovation of the BLACK+DECKER brand. With BLACK+DECKER tools, your projects will be completed with power and precision, enabling you to achieve outstanding results in every endeavor.
text pasusa 1 mtx: MTX Technology was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Since its inception, MTX has focused on manufacturing a wide range of products, including automotive electronics, vehicle care products, emergency kits, car comfort accessories, seat covers, automotive tools, outdoor products, and automotive-related gifts. Over the years, the company has become known for providing diverse and high-quality products for the automotive industry.
text pasusa 2 mtx: MTX Technology is dedicated to integrating modern technological solutions into its products. The company continuously explores new materials and technologies to improve the performance and durability of its offerings. Special emphasis is placed on the development of multifunctional devices. MTX also follows global trends in the automotive industry, adapting its products to meet the needs of modern vehicles and their users. Through collaboration with experts and engineers, the company strives to implement innovative solutions that enhance the user experience.
text pasusa 3 mtx: MTX Technology offers a wide range of products aimed at vehicles and their users. The product lineup includes electronic devices for vehicles, such as audio systems and navigation devices, as well as vehicle care and maintenance products, including cleaning and protection solutions. The company also manufactures emergency kits, comfort accessories for vehicles, seat covers, and various tools for repair and maintenance. Additionally, MTX offers products for outdoor activities and automotive-related gifts.
text do kraja mtx: Join the global community of hobbyists who trust the quality and reliability of the MTX brand. With MTX tools, your hobby projects will become even more fun and satisfying, allowing you to bring your creative ideas to life with ease and confidence.
text pasusa 1 sparta: Sparta is a brand that has developed over the years with the goal of offering quality tools at affordable prices. Their core philosophy is to make their tools easy to use for every customer, regardless of their experience level. They focus on simplicity, practicality, and accessibility, making them the perfect choice for DIY enthusiasts and hobbyists. Sparta tools are practical and highly cost-effective.
text pasusa 2 sparta: Sparta is a brand that provides everything you need for simple and everyday tasks around the house. They continually work on improving the functionality and ergonomics of their tools, keeping up with the latest industry trends.
text pasusa 3 sparta: The Sparta company offers a wide range of products designed to be functional and affordable. Their assortment includes hand tools such as wrenches, screwdrivers, pliers, and scalpels, as well as woodworking tools, including files, angle gauges, and caulking guns. Additionally, their range also includes garden tools and machinery, providing users with everything they need for work at home and around the yard.
text do kraja sparta: Join the community of hobbyists worldwide who trust the quality and practicality of the Sparta brand. With Sparta tools, your DIY projects will become even more fun and successful, allowing you to bring your creative ideas to life with ease and reliability.
SG Tools alati - Uvoznik za Srbiju: SG Tools Tools - Importer for Serbia
text pasusa 1 sg tools: SG Tools is a brand specialized in the production of diamond blades and drills for ceramics, committed to providing high-quality tools at affordable prices. Over the years, SG Tools has built a reputation as a reliable manufacturer in the field of ceramic and concrete processing. Their products are known for durability and efficiency, making them a popular choice among professionals and enthusiasts alike.
text pasusa 2 sg tools: SG Tools continuously improves its products by applying modern technologies and innovative solutions. Their diamond blades for ceramic cutting are known for their exceptionally thin cut, with a thickness of just 1.4 mm, allowing for precise and clean cutting without damaging the material. Additionally, SG Tools offers diamond core bits for dry drilling of ceramics, which do not require the use of water, increasing efficiency and reducing working time. These tools are designed to be compatible with standard machines.
text pasusa 3 sg tools: The SG Tools product range includes a wide variety of tools for cutting and drilling hard materials. Their diamond blades are available in various sizes, from 115 mm to 400 mm, and are intended for cutting granite ceramics, concrete, asphalt, and other materials. SG Tools also offers diamond core bits for drilling holes ranging from 6 mm to 100 mm in diameter, enabling precise drilling without the need for water cooling. Additionally, their offerings include circular saw blades for cutting wood and aluminum, rounding out the product lineup for various user needs.
text do kraja sg tools: If you're looking for diamond tools that will impress you with their reliability and performance, SG Tools is the brand you can count on. Their passion for innovation and continuous pursuit of improvement make them a trusted partner for both professionals and anyone who wants top-quality tools for their projects.
text pasusa 1 karcher: Kärcher is a German company founded in 1935 by Alfred Kärcher in Stuttgart. Initially focused on developing industrial heating systems, including the patented Kärcher salt furnace for hardening steel and alloys, the company made a breakthrough in cleaning technology in 1950 with the development of the first European hot water pressure washer, the DS 350. After Alfred Kärcher's death in 1959, his wife Irene took over the management of the company, expanding the business, including opening the first international branch in France in 1962.
text pasusa 2 karcher: Kärcher is known for its innovation in cleaning technology. In 1984, they launched the first portable high-pressure cleaner for home use, the HD 555 Profi. In 2003, they introduced the first fully autonomous robotic vacuum, the RoboCleaner RC 3000. The company continuously invests in research and development, focusing on connecting the entire application world and opening new business areas. Their innovative spirit is also reflected in collaborations with startups and external inventors to develop future technologies and realize new business models for the cleaning market.
text pasusa 3 karcher: Kärcher offers a wide range of cleaning products, including pressure washers, vacuum cleaners, steam cleaners, and window cleaning devices. Their pressure washers, such as the K 2, K 4, and K 5 models, are designed for various cleaning needs, from light household tasks to more demanding jobs. Additionally, Kärcher manufactures professional cleaning equipment, such as industrial vacuum cleaners and floor cleaning machines, providing solutions for various sectors and industries.
text do kraja karcher: Join millions of users around the world who trust the quality and efficiency of the Kärcher brand. With Kärcher cleaning tools, you will complete your cleaning tasks with ease and achieve impeccably clean surfaces, allowing you to enjoy a spotless and shining environment.
text pasusa 1 wolfcraft: Wolfcraft is a German company founded in 1949 by Robert Wolff in Remscheid. Initially, it focused on manufacturing drills, files, and saws for professional use. In 1961, the company began offering tools for DIY enthusiasts under the Wolfcraft brand. In 1965, the headquarters moved to Weyer, and in 1995, to Kempenich, where it remains today. Today, Wolfcraft employs over 650 people and offers around 3,000 products in more than 50 countries.
text pasusa 2 wolfcraft: Wolfcraft is known for its innovative approach to developing tools and accessories for power tools. The company has its own development department with 20 product managers, engineers, and designers who continuously work on improving existing products and developing new ones. To date, they have developed more than 550 patented products. Their commitment to quality is confirmed through collaboration with TÜV-Rheinland in developing industrial standards for testing power tool accessories.
text pasusa 3 wolfcraft: Wolfcraft's range includes a wide variety of tools and accessories. Their offering includes hand tools, power tool accessories, workbenches, clamps, and specialized tools for laminate installation and dry construction. They are particularly known for products such as one-handed clamps and laminate cutters, which have won prestigious design and innovation awards. The company continues to expand its range, keeping up with market needs and user demands.
text do kraja wolfcraft: Join thousands of users around the world who trust the quality and innovation of the Wolfcraft brand. With Wolfcraft tools, your projects will be completed with top precision and efficiency, allowing you to achieve outstanding results in every endeavor.
text pasusa 1 kwb: KWB is a company based in Stüh, Germany, founded in 1931. It boasts over 90 years of experience in the production of universal accessories for power tools and hand tools. With a team of over 200 employees, KWB has become a trusted partner for tool stores, specialized dealers, and e-commerce in over 90 countries. KWB was founded with the goal of providing tools and accessories that combine high functionality with durability.
text pasusa 2 kwb: KWB stands out for its continuous innovations and high-quality standards. Their product range includes over 5,500 products, including patented items. The company regularly introduces new products and improves existing ones, following market and customer demands. Their three-tier quality system—Professional, High Quality, and Quality—allows users to choose tools based on frequency and intensity of use.
text pasusa 3 kwb: KWB's range includes a wide variety of accessories for power tools and hand tools. Their offerings include drill bits, saw blades, grinding tools, drill accessories, as well as accessory sets compatible with various types of power tools. In addition, KWB offers hand tools such as screwdrivers, wrenches, pliers, and hammers. Their products are designed to provide reliability, durability, and functionality, allowing users to successfully complete every project.

tekst 1 o nama: Our company Stridon Group doo - Tool Store was founded in 2009 in Belgrade with headquarters in Borivoja Stevanovića street, and a retail outlet at Vojislava Ilića 141g. After a few years, we managed to open another sales facility on the other side of Belgrade - Ugrinovačka 212 (Altina), to provide stable and affordable tool supply to customers in all parts of Belgrade.
tekst 2 o nama: We are a company engaged in wholesale and retail trade, as well as internet sales, which makes us unique in the world of tools in Serbia. We sell brands of hand and power tools, accessories, protective equipment, gardening tools, vacuum cleaners, and much more! We are authorized importers and distributors of a vast number of global and domestic brands such as DeWalt, Bosch, Stanley, REMS, Wiha, Knipex, GTV, MAX, Högert, Wera, Rubi, Senco, Black+Decker, MTX, Sparta, SG Tools, Karcher, Wolfcraft.
tekst 3 o nama: On our online store, you can find over 60,000 items, and we are the largest online tool store in Serbia. Whether you have a construction company, you are a tool trader, or just a DIY enthusiast, we are the right tool supplier for you! Our company has been the best distributor of Bosch tools for 9 consecutive years, and this year, we are also the best distributor of DeWalt, Stanley, and Black+Decker tools in Serbia!

pp16: Parts of our website use cookies. A cookie is a text file stored locally on your computer, tablet, or mobile phone, which allows recognizing a user who returned to the website, in order to track and analyze website visits for the purpose of optimizing Prodavnica alata website. The website uses cookies to remember what you have done on it in a certain period and what your desired options are regarding language, font size, and other display features. This means you do not have to specify your desired options every time you visit the website. Additionally, cookies help us analyze how you use our website and whether you encounter obstacles during navigation. They also help us customize online ads and offers according to your interests and needs. Personal data is not stored in this case, so this information cannot be used for personal identification. If you do not want to accept the storage of cookies on your computer, you need to disable cookies for this website in your internet browser. You can manually delete previously installed cookies from your internet browser. Disabling or deleting cookies may also mean reducing certain website functionalities.
pp18: You can delete cookies from your internet browser yourself and thus disable their use. Below are links with detailed instructions for deleting cookies from several most commonly used browsers: Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera. If you use a different browser, follow the instructions of the relevant provider. If you disable cookies, you will not be able to use all the functionalities of our website.
pp20: You can contact us at any time via email: office@stridon.rs, or phone: 064-616-5003, and request a change of cookie settings.
pp21: Which Cookies Does This Website Use?
pp23: These cookies include Static and Functionality cookies. These cookies are necessary for the website to function, so they cannot be disabled in our systems. They are usually set in response to your requests for services, such as privacy settings, logging in to an account, or filling out forms. You can block these cookies or set your browser to notify you about them, but in that case, some parts of the website may not work.
pp25: These cookies (also called advertising cookies) are used to deliver advertised content relevant to you and can be used to track the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns on the website. These cookies are placed on our website by our partner providers of certain marketing services, and they can remember your web browsing activity on our website. This information may be used to better understand you and your needs, such as demographics (where you come from to our website), age, etc. Only anonymous information is retained and used in this way and only for the purpose of providing you with the most relevant content.
pp27: These cookies allow us to count the number of visits and traffic sources, so we can measure and improve the efficiency of our website. They help us find out which pages are most and least popular, as well as how visitors navigate the website. All data collected by these cookies are aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not accept efficiency cookies, we will not know when you visited our website.
pp29: We may update these guidelines from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you, but please check these guidelines regularly to ensure that you are familiar with the latest version.
